choose.when: insert into comment (user_id, content, regdate, ref, step, lev, parent_num, reply, board_no) values (#{userId}, #{content}, now(), (select no from (SELECT no FROM comment ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT 1)as t) +1, #{step}, #{lev}, (select no from (SELECT no FROM comment ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT 1)as t) +1, #{reply}, #{boardNo})
choose.otherwise: insert into comment (user_id, content, regdate, ref, step, lev, parent_num, reply, board_no) values (#{userId}, #{content}, now(), #{ref}, #{step}, #{lev}, #{parentNum}, #{reply}, #{boardNo})

select: select * from comment where board_no = #{id} order by ref desc, step asc
